settings.AccountHelpHint1: LunaSea offers a free account to backup your configuration to the cloud, with additional features coming in the future!
settings.AmoledThemeBordersDescription: Add Subtle Borders Across the UI
settings.ApiKeyRequiredMessage: API key is required to connect to {}
settings.BackupConfigurationHint1: All backups are encrypted before being exported
settings.BackupConfigurationHint2: The encryption key must be at least 8 characters
settings.BannersNotificationModuleSuppor:
Webhook-based notifications are currently only supported in the modules listed below.

Additional module support will come in the future!
settings.BasicAuthenticationHint1: The username must not contain a colon
settings.BasicAuthenticationHint2: The password can contain a colon
settings.BasicAuthenticationHint3: The username and password are automatically converted to base64 encoding
settings.BroadcastAddressHint1: This is the broadcast address of your local network
settings.BroadcastAddressHint2: Typically this is the IP address of your machine with the last octet set to 255
settings.BroadcastAddressHint3: Given an example machine IP address of 192.168.1.111, the resulting broadcast IP address is 192.168.1.255
settings.ClearConfigurationHint1: Are you sure you want to clear your configuration?
settings.ClearConfigurationHint2: You will be starting from a clean slate, please ensure you backup your current configuration first!
settings.ClearConfigurationHint3: If you are signed into a LunaSea account, you will be signed out.
settings.ClearImageCacheHint1: Are you sure you want to clear all images from the cache?
settings.ClearImageCacheHint2: Re-downloading images for a large library can consume a large amount of data.
settings.ClearLogsHint1:
Are you sure you want to clear all recorded logs?

Logs can be useful for bug reports and debugging.
settings.ConnectedSuccessfullyMessage: {} is ready to use with LunaSea!
settings.CopiedDeviceURL: Copied your device-based URL to the clipboard
settings.CopiedUserURL: Copied your user-based URL to the clipboard
settings.DatabaseCorruptionDetectedMessa: Database corruption has been detected and your configuration has been cleared.
Sorry about the inconvenience, all previously created backups should be restorable even when previously exported with a corrupted database.
settings.DefaultOptionsDescription: Set Sorting, Filtering, and View Options
settings.DecryptBackupHint1: Please enter the encryption key for this backup.
settings.DeleteAccountHint1: Are you sure you want to delete your LunaSea account?
settings.DeleteAccountHint2: This process will also delete all stored cloud backups and data attached to this account.
settings.DeleteHeaderHint1: Are you sure you want to delete this header?
settings.DeleteIndexerHint1: Are you sure you want to delete this indexer?
settings.DeleteModuleHint1: Are you sure you want to delete this external module?
settings.DismissBannersHint1: Are you sure you want to dismiss all tooltip banners?
settings.DismissBannersHint2: The tooltip banners will give you tips and hints for features available within LunaSea.
settings.EmailSentSuccessMessage: An email to reset your password has been sent!
settings.FailedToClearImageCacheDescript: The image cache could not be cleared
settings.HostHint1: This is the URL in which you access the web GUI for the service
settings.HostHint2: You must include either http:// or https://
settings.HostHint4: When not using a reverse proxy, please include the port
settings.HostHint5: To add basic authentication, please use the custom headers feature
settings.HostRequiredMessage: Host is required to connect to {}
settings.HostValidation: Host must include http:// or https://
settings.ImageBackgroundOpacityHint1: Set the opacity of background images.
settings.ImageBackgroundOpacityHint2: To completely disable fetching background images, set the value to 0.
settings.ImageCacheClearedDescription: The image cache has been cleared
settings.LogsClearedDescription: All recorded logs have been cleared
settings.MACAddressHint1: This is the MAC address of the machine that you want to wake up
settings.MACAddressHint2: MAC addresses contain six two-digit hexadecimal nibbles (an octet)
settings.MACAddressHint3: Hexadecimal digits range from 0-9 and A-F
settings.MACAddressHint4: Each hexadecimal octet should be separated by a colon
settings.MustBeValueBetween: Must be a value between {} and {}
settings.NotAuthorizedMessage: LunaSea is not authorized to show notifications. Please go to your device's settings to enable notifications.
settings.NotificationsDescription: Set up Webhooks for Push Notifications
settings.NoAdditionalProfilesAdded: No additional profiles have been added
settings.OpenDrawerOnBackActionDescripti: Open the drawer instead of closing LunaSea
settings.PasswordHint1: If your password includes special characters, considering adding a basic authentication header with your username and password instead for better support
settings.ProfilesBannerLine1: Profiles allow you to add multiple instances of modules into LunaSea. You can switch between profiles in the main navigation drawer.
settings.ProfilesBannerLine2: Newznab indexer searching and external modules are enabled and shared across all profiles.
settings.QuickActionsDescription: Quick Actions on the Home Screen
settings.QuickActionsBannerLine1: Quick actions allow you to quickly jump into modules directly from the home screen or launcher on your device by long pressing LunaSea's icon.
settings.QuickActionsBannerLine2: A limited number of quick actions can be set at a time, and enabling more than your launcher can support will have no effect.
settings.SignedOutSuccessMessage: Signed out of your LunaSea account
settings.SignOutHint1: Are you sure you want to sign out of your LunaSea account?
